game.name: Serious Breakdown
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Serious Breakdown is a platformer, in the role of a robot, you need to clean up the levels as much as possible and get the necessary parts. Learn to dodge or kill enemies. At the end of the path, you will need to defeat the main villain of this universe.
